title: AI in an 'industrial bubble' but will benefit society: Bezos
description: Artificial intelligence technology is in an "industrial bubble," Amazon founder Jeff Bezos told a tech conference in Italy on Friday, but the benefits to society will be "immense". "Investors don't usually give a team of six people a couple billion dollars with no product... and that's happening today," Bezos told…
content:

title: Stocks Bull Run Extends on Latest AI Deal Spree: Markets Wrap
description: (Bloomberg) -- US stocks touched record highs amid another round of big-ticket artificial intelligence deals and partnerships, bucking the prospect of a prolonged shutdown and a gloomy reading on business activity. Treasuries and the dollar slid.

title: Bezos says AI spending boom is a bubble that will pay off
description: Amazon.com Inc. Chairman Jeff Bezos said that the spending on artificial intelligence resembles an "industrial bubble" that could lead to lost investment but will also make society better off.
content:
(Bloomberg/Alberto Brambilla) — Amazon.com Inc. Chairman Jeff Bezos said that the spending on artificial intelligence resembles an “industrial bubble” that could lead to lost investment but will also make society better off.

title: Bezos admits AI is in 'industrial bubble,' but eventual societal benefits remain 'real'
description: Amazon (AMZN) founder and former CEO said artificial intelligence is currently in "a kind of industrial bubble" and stock prices are "disconnected from the fundamentals" during a tech conference in Italy on Friday, according to CNBC.

title: Nazi killer in Holocaust image identified using AI: researcher
description: A U.S.-based German historian believes he’s uncovered the identity of the Nazi killer in one of the most infamous Holocaust images ever taken – and he did so with the help of artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Why Artificial Intelligence Might Become Essential For Job Security
description: Advancements in AI have sparked fears about job loss. In reality, embracing AI, upskilling, and exploring new AI-related roles may reshape your career.
content: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is no longer confined to science fiction or research labs. It's everywhere, and it's becoming a driving force in the workplace. Routine tasks are being automated, and complex decision-making is getting AI assistance. In f... [4524 chars]
